  -H 'Accept: text/event-stream' \

  --data-raw '{"content":"tell me about carl zeiss","actionType":"user","messageType":"user-question","sessionId":"6867c22322c71d30bd10bb96","convoId":"68681abafd2ef5c5c3a3a7e9"}'


  ## API Spec
  Add User Messages
Authorizations:
HTTPBearer
Request Body schema: application/json
content
Content (string) or Content (null) (Content)
messageType
Messagetype (string) or Messagetype (null) (Messagetype)
messageId
Messageid (string) or Messageid (null) (Messageid)
selectedStrategy
Selectedstrategy (string) or Selectedstrategy (null) (Selectedstrategy)
selectedAction
Selectedaction (string) or Selectedaction (null) (Selectedaction)
agentTaskId
Agenttaskid (string) or Agenttaskid (null) (Agenttaskid)
targetText
Targettext (string) or Targettext (null) (Targettext)
messageIds
Array of Messageids (strings) or Messageids (null) (Messageids)
Default: []
targetFullContent
Targetfullcontent (string) or Targetfullcontent (null) (Targetfullcontent)
model
AIModel (string) or ImageGenerationModel (string) or Model (null) (Model)
actionType
string (ActionSendMessageType)
Default: "user"
Enum: "agent" "user" "replies-agent" "replies-user" "mobile-record" "direct-agent"
convoId
required
string (Convoid)
sessionId
required
string (Sessionid)
files
Array of strings (Files)
Default: []
